mapper.insert:
insert into data_case_reduce
seqno, approve_repay_amt, reduce_valid_time, reduce_result, reduce_flag,
values
#{seqno}, #{approveRepayAmt}, #{reduceValidTime}, #{reduceResult}, 0,
mapper.select: select dc.collect_area as area,dc.client,dc.batch_no as batchNo,dc.name as targetName,dc.overdue_bill_time as accountAge, dc.complete_time as completeTime,dcr.seqno,dc.odv,dc.create_time as reduceReferTime,dc.reduce_status as reduceStatus, dcr.reduce_valid_time as reduceValidTime,dc.complete_user as completeUser,dcr.approve_repay_amt as approveRepayAmt, dcr.reduce_result as reduceResult,dc.en_repay_amt as enRepayAmt,dc.reduce_update_time as reduceUpdateTime, dc.collect_status as collectStatus from data_case_reduce dcr LEFT JOIN data_case dc on dcr.seqno = dc.seq_no where dcr.reduce_flag !=1 and dcr.id = #{id}

select dc.collect_area as area,dc.client,dc.batch_no as batchNo,dc.name as targetName,dc.overdue_bill_time as accountAge, dc.complete_time as completeTime,dcr.seqno,dc.odv,dc.create_time as reduceReferTime,dc.reduce_status as reduceStatus, dcr.reduce_valid_time as reduceValidTime,dc.complete_user as completeUser,dcr.approve_repay_amt as approveRepayAmt, dcr.reduce_result as reduceResult,dc.en_repay_amt as enRepayAmt,dc.reduce_update_time as reduceUpdateTime, dc.collect_status as collectStatus,dcr.id from data_case_reduce dcr LEFT JOIN data_case dc on dcr.seqno = dc.seq_no where dcr.reduce_flag !=1
AND dc.collect_area like CONCAT('%',#{area},'%')
AND seqno like CONCAT('%',#{seqno},'%')
AND name like CONCAT('%',#{targetName},'%')
and batch_no = #{batchNo}
and collect_status = #{collectStatus}
AND client like CONCAT('%',#{client},'%')
and overdue_bill_time = #{accountAge}
AND odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
and reduce_status = #{reduceStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(complete_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{completeTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(complete_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{completeTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{reduceReferTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{reduceReferTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(reduce_valid_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{reduceValidTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(reduce_valid_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{reduceValidTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
